Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Cephalothin (0.5-64 μg/mL) EPY
BD PhoenixM Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent cephalothin (0.5-64 μg/mL) - Gram positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System with cephalothin panel for rapid automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria from pure culture, specifically for the addition of cephalothin to Gram Positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels.
